title: 1503 AD - Treasures, Monsters & Pirates EXPANSION.T-PLAGUE
description:
*******************************************************************************
                    ANNO 1503 TREASURES, MONSTERS & PIRATES
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game
Platform.............: Windows 9x/ME/2000
Image Format.........: .iso
Image Created with...: Nero
Burn Tested..........: Yes




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Post Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Posted by............: T-PLAGUE
Posted on............: 5/21/2008

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The official Expansion Set offers exciting new challenges, additional detailed 
graphics, optimised game functions and new adventures that make \"Treasures, 
Monsters and Pirates\" an absolute must for ANNO 1503 fans.

Amongst the enrichments to the world of ANNO 1503 are three new continuous play 
games and twelve more single-player scenarios in varying degrees of difficulty.

    * 12 exciting new single-player scenarios in varying degrees of difficulty.
    * 3 new continuous play games with new game elements and new islands for 
professional gamers and casual players alike.
    * Clear statistics screen, which shows detailed information on the city\&#039;s 
economic status.
    * Additional graphics brighten up your 1503 world: ornamental parks and 
gardens, 10 new house designs, many additional animals such as bears, gorillas 
and much more.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Unpack
2. Mount .iso
3. Install
4. Have fun!

Yes, you can install the UK add-on over the US version.

It is quite simple. Just use \"regedit\" from your run command in Windows and edit 
the registry.

Look under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE ----> SOFTWARE---> Max-Designs and see the data 
string.

Change LANGUAGE value from US to ENG.

Change VERSION 1.04 to 1.0
		

----------------------------------

Please help SEED this rare torrent. If sharing, please give credits to me.

Thanks,
T-PLAGUE
